02664         end if
02665 
02666         nsh = jpmn-1
02667         if(nsh<=0)      go to 60
02668 !
02669 !  Shift (rotate) the IPL array to have the invisible border
02670 !  line segments contained in the first part of the IPL array.
02671 !
02672         nsht3 = nsh*3
02673 
02674         do jp2t3 = 3,nsht3,3
02675           jp3t3 = jp2t3+nlt3
02676           ipl(jp3t3-2) = ipl(jp2t3-2)
02677           ipl(jp3t3-1) = ipl(jp2t3-1)
02678           ipl(jp3t3)   = ipl(jp2t3)
02679         end do
02680 
02681         do jp2t3 = 3,nlt3,3
02682           jp3t3 = jp2t3+nsht3
02683           ipl(jp2t3-2) = ipl(jp3t3-2)
02684           ipl(jp2t3-1) = ipl(jp3t3-1)
02685           ipl(jp2t3)   = ipl(jp3t3)
02686         end do
02687 
02688         jpmx = jpmx-nsh
02689 !
02690 !  Add triangles to the IPT array, updates border line
02691 !  segments in the IPL array, and sets flags for the border
02692 !  line segments to be reexamined in the IWL array.
02693 !
02694    60   jwl = 0
02695 
02696         do 64  jp2 = jpmx,nl0
02697 
02698           jp2t3 = jp2*3
02699           ipl1 = ipl(jp2t3-2)
02700           ipl2 = ipl(jp2t3-1)
02701           it   = ipl(jp2t3)
02702 !
02703 !  Add a triangle to the IPT array.
02704 !
02705           nt0 = nt0+1
02706           ntt3 = ntt3+3
02707           ipt(ntt3-2) = ipl2
02708           ipt(ntt3-1) = ipl1
02709           ipt(ntt3)   = ip1
02710 !
02711 !  Update border line segments in the IPL array.
02712 !
02713           if(jp2/=jpmx)      go to 61
02714           ipl(jp2t3-1) = ip1
02715           ipl(jp2t3)   = nt0
02716    61     if(jp2/=nl0)       go to 62
02717           nln = jpmx+1
02718           nlnt3 = nln*3
02719           ipl(nlnt3-2) = ip1
02720           ipl(nlnt3-1) = ipl(1)
02721           ipl(nlnt3)   = nt0
02722 !
02723 !  Determine the vertex that does not lie on the border
02724 !  line segments.
02725 !
02726    62     itt3 = it*3
02727           ipti = ipt(itt3-2)
02728           if(ipti/=ipl1.and.ipti/=ipl2)   go to 63
02729           ipti = ipt(itt3-1)
02730           if(ipti/=ipl1.and.ipti/=ipl2)   go to 63
02731           ipti = ipt(itt3)
02732 !
02733 !  Check if the exchange is necessary.
02734 !
02735    63     if(idxchg(xd,yd,ip1,ipti,ipl1,ipl2)==0)     go to 64
02736 !
02737 !  Modify the IPT array when necessary.
02738 !
02739           ipt(itt3-2) = ipti
02740           ipt(itt3-1) = ipl1
02741           ipt(itt3)   = ip1
02742           ipt(ntt3-1) = ipti
02743           if(jp2==jpmx)      ipl(jp2t3) = it
02744           if(jp2==nl0.and.ipl(3)==it)     ipl(3) = nt0
02745 !
02746 !  Set flags in the IWL array.
02747 !
02748           jwl = jwl+4
02749           iwl(jwl-3) = ipl1
02750           iwl(jwl-2) = ipti
02751           iwl(jwl-1) = ipti
02752           iwl(jwl)   = ipl2
02753 
02754    64   continue
02755 
02756         nl0 = nln
02757         nlt3 = nlnt3
02758         nlf = jwl/2
02759         if(nlf==0)      go to 79
02760 !
02761 !  Improve triangulation.
02762 !
02763    70   ntt3p3 = ntt3+3
02764 
02765         do 78  irep = 1,nrep
02766 
02767           do 76  ilf = 1,nlf
02768 
02769             ilft2 = ilf*2
02770             ipl1 = iwl(ilft2-1)
02771             ipl2 = iwl(ilft2)
02772 !
02773 !  Locate in the IPT array two triangles on both sides of
02774 !  the flagged line segment.
02775 !
02776             ntf = 0
02777 
02778             do 71  itt3r = 3,ntt3,3
02779               itt3 = ntt3p3-itt3r
02780               ipt1 = ipt(itt3-2)
02781               ipt2 = ipt(itt3-1)
02782               ipt3 = ipt(itt3)
02783               if(ipl1/=ipt1.and.ipl1/=ipt2.and. &
02784                  ipl1/=ipt3)      go to 71
02785               if(ipl2/=ipt1.and.ipl2/=ipt2.and. &
02786                  ipl2/=ipt3)      go to 71
02787               ntf = ntf+1
02788               itf(ntf) = itt3/3
02789               if(ntf==2)     go to 72
02790    71       continue
02791 
02792             if(ntf<2)       go to 76
02793 !
02794 !  Determine the vertexes of the triangles that do not lie
02795 !  on the line segment.
02796 !
02797    72       it1t3 = itf(1)*3
02798             ipti1 = ipt(it1t3-2)
02799             if(ipti1/=ipl1.and.ipti1/=ipl2)    go to 73
02800             ipti1 = ipt(it1t3-1)
02801             if(ipti1/=ipl1.and.ipti1/=ipl2)    go to 73
02802             ipti1 = ipt(it1t3)
02803    73       it2t3 = itf(2)*3
02804             ipti2 = ipt(it2t3-2)
02805             if(ipti2/=ipl1.and.ipti2/=ipl2)    go to 74
02806             ipti2 = ipt(it2t3-1)
02807             if(ipti2/=ipl1.and.ipti2/=ipl2)    go to 74
02808             ipti2 = ipt(it2t3)
02809 !
02810 !  Check if the exchange is necessary.
02811 !
02812    74       if(idxchg(xd,yd,ipti1,ipti2,ipl1,ipl2)==0) then
02813               go to 76
02814             end if
02815 !
02816 !  Modify the IPT array when necessary.
02817 !
02818             ipt(it1t3-2) = ipti1
02819             ipt(it1t3-1) = ipti2
02820             ipt(it1t3)   = ipl1
02821             ipt(it2t3-2) = ipti2
02822             ipt(it2t3-1) = ipti1
02823             ipt(it2t3)   = ipl2
02824 !
02825 !  Set new flags.
02826 !
02827             jwl = jwl+8
02828             iwl(jwl-7) = ipl1
02829             iwl(jwl-6) = ipti1
02830             iwl(jwl-5) = ipti1
02831             iwl(jwl-4) = ipl2
02832             iwl(jwl-3) = ipl2
02833             iwl(jwl-2) = ipti2
02834             iwl(jwl-1) = ipti2
02835             iwl(jwl)   = ipl1
02836 
02837             do jlt3 = 3,nlt3,3
02838               iplj1 = ipl(jlt3-2)
02839               iplj2 = ipl(jlt3-1)
02840               if((iplj1==ipl1.and.iplj2==ipti2).or. &
02841                  (iplj2==ipl1.and.iplj1==ipti2)) &
02842                                ipl(jlt3) = itf(1)
02843               if((iplj1==ipl2.and.iplj2==ipti1).or. &
02844                  (iplj2==ipl2.and.iplj1==ipti1)) &
02845                                ipl(jlt3) = itf(2)
02846             end do
02847 
02848    76     continue
02849           nlfc = nlf
02850           nlf = jwl/2
02851           if(nlf==nlfc)      go to 79
02852 !
02853 !  Reset the IWL array for the next round.
02854 !
02855           jwl = 0
02856           jwl1mn = (nlfc+1)*2
02857           nlft2 = nlf*2
02858 
02859           do jwl1 = jwl1mn,nlft2,2
02860             jwl = jwl+2
02861             iwl(jwl-1) = iwl(jwl1-1)
02862             iwl(jwl)   = iwl(jwl1)
02863           end do
02864 
02865           nlf = jwl/2
02866    78   continue
02867    79 continue
02868 !
02869 !  Rearrange the IPT array so that the vertexes of each triangle
02870 !  are listed counter-clockwise.
02871 !
02872    80 do itt3 = 3,ntt3,3
02873 
02874         ip1 = ipt(itt3-2)
02875         ip2 = ipt(itt3-1)
02876         ip3 = ipt(itt3)
02877 
02878         if(side(xd(ip1),yd(ip1),xd(ip2),yd(ip2),xd(ip3),yd(ip3)) &
02879               < 0.0D+00 ) then
02880           ipt(itt3-2) = ip2
02881           ipt(itt3-1) = ip1
02882         end if
02883 
02884       end do
02885 
02886       nt = nt0
02887       nl = nl0
02888       return
02889 !
02890 !  Error exit.
02891 !
02892    90 write (*,2090)  ndp0
02893       go to 93
02894    91 write ( *,2091)  ndp0,ip1,ip2,x1,y1
02895       go to 93
02896    92 write ( *,2092)  ndp0
02897    93 write ( *,2093)
02898       nt = 0
02899       return
02900 
02901  2090 format(1x/' ***   ndp less than 4.'/'   ndp  = ',i5)
02902  2091 format(1x/' ***   identical data points.'/ &
02903          '   ndp  = ',i5,5x,'ip1  = ',i5,5x,'ip2  = ',i5, &
02904          5x,'xd  = ',e12.4,5x,'yd  = ',e12.4)
02905  2092 format(1x/' ***   all collinear data points.'/ &
02906          '   ndp  = ',i5)
02907  2093 format(' error detected in routine   idtang'/)
02908       end subroutine idtang
02909 
02910       function idxchg ( x, y, i1, i2, i3, i4 )
02911 
02912 !*****************************************************************************80
02913 !
02914 !! IDXCHG determines whether two triangles should be exchanged.
02915 !
02916 !  Discussion:
02917 !
02918 !    This function determines whether or not the exchange of two
02919 !    triangles is necessary on the basis of max-min-angle criterion
02920 !    by Charles Lawson.
02921 !
02922 !  Modified:
02923 !
02924 !    24 August 2007
02925 !
02926 !  Author:
02927 !
02928 !    Hiroshi Akima
02929 !
02930 !  References:
02931 !
02932 !    Hiroshi Akima,
02933 !    Algorithm 526:
02934 !    A Method of Bivariate Interpolation and Smooth Surface Fitting
02935 !    for Values Given at Irregularly Distributed Points,
02936 !    ACM Transactions on Mathematical Software,
02937 !    Volume 4, Number 2, June 1978, pages 160-164.
02938 !
02939 !    Hiroshi Akima,
02940 !    On Estimating Partial Derivatives for Bivariate Interpolation
02941 !    of Scattered Data,
02942 !    Rocky Mountain Journal of Mathematics,
02943 !    Volume 14, Number 1, Winter 1984, pages 41-51.
02944 !
02945 !  Parameters:
02946 !
02947 !    Input, real ( kind = 8 ) X(*), Y(*), the coordinates of the data.
02948 !
02949 !    Input, integer I1, I2, I3, I4, indices of four points P1, P2,
02950 !    P3, and P4 that form a quadrilateral with P3 and P4 connected diagonally.
02951 !
02952 !    Output, integer IDXCHG, is 1 if an exchange is recommended, and 0 otherwise.
02953 !
02954   implicit none
02955 
02956   real (kind=T_DBL) a1sq
02957   real (kind=T_DBL) a2sq
02958   real (kind=T_DBL) a3sq
02959   real (kind=T_DBL) a4sq
02960   real (kind=T_DBL) b1sq
02961   real (kind=T_DBL) b2sq
02962   real (kind=T_DBL) b3sq
02963   real (kind=T_DBL) b4sq
02964   real (kind=T_DBL) c1sq
02965   real (kind=T_DBL) c2sq
02966   real (kind=T_DBL) c3sq
02967   real (kind=T_DBL) c4sq
02968   integer (kind=T_INT) i1
02969   integer (kind=T_INT) i2
02970   integer (kind=T_INT) i3
02971   integer (kind=T_INT) i4
02972   integer (kind=T_INT) idx
02973   integer (kind=T_INT) idxchg
02974   real (kind=T_DBL) s1sq
02975   real (kind=T_DBL) s2sq
02976   real (kind=T_DBL) s3sq
02977   real (kind=T_DBL) s4sq
02978   real (kind=T_DBL) u1
02979   real (kind=T_DBL) u2
02980   real (kind=T_DBL) u3
02981   real (kind=T_DBL) u4
02982   real (kind=T_DBL) x(*)
02983   real (kind=T_DBL) x1
02984   real (kind=T_DBL) x2
02985   real (kind=T_DBL) x3
02986   real (kind=T_DBL) x4
02987   real (kind=T_DBL) y(*)
02988   real (kind=T_DBL) y1
02989   real (kind=T_DBL) y2
02990   real (kind=T_DBL) y3
02991   real (kind=T_DBL) y4
02992 !
02993 !  Preliminary processing.
02994 !
02995   x1 = x(i1)
02996   y1 = y(i1)
02997   x2 = x(i2)
02998   y2 = y(i2)
02999   x3 = x(i3)
03000   y3 = y(i3)
03001   x4 = x(i4)
03002   y4 = y(i4)
03003 !
03004 !  Calculation.
03005 !
03006   idx = 0
03007   u3 = ( y2 - y3 ) * ( x1 - x3 ) - ( x2 - x3 ) * ( y1 - y3 )
03008   u4 = ( y1 - y4 ) * ( x2 - x4 ) - ( x1 - x4 ) * ( y2 - y4 )
03009 
03010   if ( 0.0D+00 < u3 * u4 ) then
03011 
03012     u1 = (y3-y1)*(x4-x1)-(x3-x1)*(y4-y1)
03013     u2 = (y4-y2)*(x3-x2)-(x4-x2)*(y3-y2)
03014 
03015     a1sq = (x1-x3)**2+(y1-y3)**2
03016     b3sq = a1sq
03017     b1sq = (x4-x1)**2+(y4-y1)**2
03018     a4sq = b1sq
03019     c1sq = (x3-x4)**2+(y3-y4)**2
03020     c2sq = c1sq
03021     a2sq = (x2-x4)**2+(y2-y4)**2
03022     b4sq = a2sq
03023     b2sq = (x3-x2)**2+(y3-y2)**2
03024     a3sq = b2sq
03025     c3sq = (x2-x1)**2+(y2-y1)**2
03026     c4sq = c3sq
03027 
03028     s1sq = u1 * u1 / ( c1sq * max ( a1sq, b1sq ) )
03029     s2sq = u2 * u2 / ( c2sq * max ( a2sq, b2sq ) )
03030     s3sq = u3 * u3 / ( c3sq * max ( a3sq, b3sq ) )
03031     s4sq = u4 * u4 / ( c4sq * max ( a4sq, b4sq ) )
03032 
03033     if ( min ( s1sq, s2sq ) < min ( s3sq, s4sq ) ) then
03034       idx = 1
03035     end if
03036 
03037   end if
03038 
03039   idxchg = idx
03040 
03041   return
03042 end function idxchg
03043 
03044 end module bivar
Generated on Fri Mar 19 15:02:23 2010 for swb by  1.5.9
